office.description: This is a hexagonal room in the corner of the house, nestled under a slanted roof. The walls are covered in maps and calendars. Two bookshelves flank the workspace, and there is a window that looks out at the sea.

start.description:
You are in a quiet room with soft lighting.
Underfoot is a soft, colorful rug.

attic.description:
Dust swirls in beams of light between old boxes. The boxes are all neatly labeled. A rocking chair casts an inviting shadow.
From the corner, a cat eyes you with suspicion.

observatory.description: You stand on an outdoor platform with a sturdy wooden railing. Greeting you in all directions is the estuarial bay, featuring a passel of shorebirds, weird ducks, and an occasional mink swimming past.
